definitions.text: a column of light (as from a beacon)
a branch of an umbel or an umbelliform inflorescence
(mathematics) a straight line extending from a point
a group of nearly parallel lines of electromagnetic radiation
the syllable naming the second (supertonic) note of any major scale in solmization
any of the stiff bony spines in the fin of a fish
cartilaginous fishes having horizontally flattened bodies and enlarged winglike pectoral fins with gills on the underside; most swim by moving the pectoral fins

examples: That tower rays a laser beam for miles across the sky

definitions.text: extend or spread outward from a center or focus or inward towards a center
examples: spokes radiate from the hub of the wheel
This plants radiate spines in all directions
